授業概要・カリキュラム上の位置づけ: The purpose of this course is to introduce students to the fundamentals of academic English reading in preparation for studying at a university in a native-English speaking environment. Please note that this course is for students with an upper intermediate level of English.
授業方法: This course will be conducted on an on-demand (オンデマンド) online basis. Each week, an assignment package will be uploaded, and students will be required to complete the assignment and submit it online. Students will have ample opportunity to communicate with and get feedback from the instructor through Teams.
到達目標: Students will read academic texts on a variety of topics and learn skills and strategies for effective reading, vocabulary building, note-taking, and critical thinking.
授業計画・課題に対するフィードバック: Class 1 Overview and Chapter 1: BusinessClass 2 Complete Chapter 1Class 3 Chapter 2: PsychologyClass 4 Complete Chapter 2Class 5 Chapter 3: Nutrition StudiesClass 6 Complete Chapter 3Class 7 Chapter 4: MedicineClass 8 Complete Chapter 4Class 9 Chapter 5: American LiteratureClass 10 Complete Chapter 5Class 11 Chapter 6: Art HistoryClass 12 Complete Chapter 6Class 13 Chapter 7: ForensicsClass 14 Complete Chapter 7Class 15 Chapter 8: Prehistory
準備学習内容・時間の目安: Students should expect to spend 30 minutes after each class reviewing the new vocabulary introduced during the lesson.
成績評価の方法: Students' grades are based on the satisfactory completion and quality of the assignments.
テキスト: Longman Academic Reading Series 3  (Pearson Japan)履修が確定した学生は、世界堂の店頭でテキストを各自購入してください。在庫不足の場合は、ISBN番号を参考にし、書店や出版社から各自で購入してください。
